docs.text:
Introduction


This website contains a collection of publicly available datasets used by the 
Hemberg Group
 at the 
Sanger Institute
.


scater


We use scater toolkit for analysis of scRNA-Seq data. For each dataset you can find both a scater object and a scater report.


Contributions


We welcome contributions to our collection. Please create a pull request to our 
GitHub repository
 providing the following information:




bash file with downloading and processing instructions.


R script file with the instruction on how to create a scater object.


Annotation information about the dataset
